activities: Intent Media, Inc. is a digital advertising technology company that helps advertisers and publishers deliver tailored content and advertising. The type of information we collect and use via our technology platform is considered non-personally identifiable in most jurisdictions. Our technology collects IP addresses and other pseudonymous information which in some jurisdictions may be considered personal data.
